pages.title: How To Make the ETB Platform an APP

sections.title: Make The ETB Platform an App On Your Phone!
sections.content:
* * *
Check out this quick video to learn how to make the ETB Platform like an App on your phone! This will help you access your library with the click of a button!
![Video Thumbnail](https://kajabi-storefronts-production.kajabi-cdn.com/kajabi-storefronts-production/themes/2149228881/settings_images/ybvUyjt9TqGZPjsGj8bL_sae.jpg)
